Author: Apoc
Name: English to Japanese Quick Phrases
Description: Browse categorized English-Japanese phrases and copy translations to clipboard. Features auto-translation of Japanese chat to English with configurable HUD button. Use /translate to open.
Punchline: Quick access to categorized English-Japanese phrase translations.
Changelog: Fixed multi-phrase translation (円 舞 → "Circle" "Dance"), added plugin icons, improved HUD button
